CustomField.formula: IF(OR( ISPICKVAL( GDPR_compliance_was_met_check__c ,"YES"),ISPICKVAL( GDPR_compliance_was_met_check__c ,"NA")),4, IF(OR(ISPICKVAL(GDPR_compliance_was_met_check__c ,"NO - MINOR BREACH"),ISPICKVAL(GDPR_compliance_was_met_check__c ,"NO - MAJOR BREACH")),0, 0))
CustomField.label: GDPR & Compliance Was Met Scoring
